    • choiceVinil

      public static void choiceVinil​(Classes.vinilDisk param) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Take the vinyl record and show playlist of this record, if user choose number of song which doesn't exist Myzyafon will offer to chose another number, until this number exist. After it plays the chosen song and close the Myzyafon
      Parameters:
      param - one of the vinyl records
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - possible exception
      java.lang.InterruptedException - possible exception
      See Also:
      play(), songError()

      public static void outputDeviceVinil​(Classes.vinilDisk v1, Classes.vinilDisk v2) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Shows playlist of chosen device, user needs to chose the number of the song, if this number don't exist user should input the number one more time

      v2 - vinyl record Vinyl of the last
      Throws:

    • outputDeviceCD

      public static void outputDeviceCD​(Classes.cdDisk v1, Classes.cdDisk v2) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Shows playlist of chosen device, user needs to chose the number of the song, if this number don't exist user should input the number one more time
      Parameters:
      v1 - cd disk For chill
      v2 - cd disk You have found, we are showing
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - possible exception

    • outputDeviceUnivers

      public static void outputDeviceUnivers​(Classes.vinilDisk v1, Classes.vinilDisk v2, Classes.cdDisk cd1, Classes.cdDisk cd2, Classes.uniDisk u1, Classes.uniDisk u2) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Shows playlist of chosen device, user needs to chose the number of the song, if this number don't exist
      Parameters:
      v1 - vinyl record Vine for the evening
      v2 - vinyl record Vinyl of the last
      cd1 - cd disk For chill
      cd2 - cd disk You have found, we are showing
      u1 - flesh card Top 10 of 2077
      u2 - flesh card More songs
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - possible exception
      java.lang.InterruptedException - possible exception
      See Also:
      choiceVinil(Classes.vinilDisk), choiceCD(Classes.cdDisk), choiceUniver(Classes.uniDisk), choiceError()
